metadata.title: CVE-2015-7882 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper handling of LDAP authentication in MongoDB Server versions 3.0.0to 3.0.6 allows an unauthenticated client to gain unauthorized access.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
